events.message: We have received the application from John Doe for the Software Engineer position. His resume shows strong experience in backend development and cloud services.
The application for John Doe has been categorized under Engineering due to the keywords related to software and development in his profile.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to John Doe's application to proceed with further screening.
Initial screening of John Doe's qualifications went well. He demonstrated a solid understanding of relevant technologies and coding practices.
John Doe has responded promptly and expressed strong interest in the Software Engineer role with eagerness to move forward.
A technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for John Doe on May 7th to assess his coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
